description.translate: You are strong, very strong, the strongest of us.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Guédéron\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Tu es fort, très fort,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7le plus fort d'entre nous.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7You are strong, very strong,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7the strongest of us.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7RES§c-1\"}"]}}
